## IMathMatrix.ColumnCount 属性

矩阵中的列数

```csharp
public int ColumnCount { get; }
```

### 示例

示例：

```csharp
[C#]
IMathMatrix matrix = new MathMatrix(2, 3);
int columnCount = matrix.ColumnCount;
```
